title: South-east thunderstorms during school pick-up; Cyclonic winds destroy family home | 7NEWS Brisbane

title: Death toll rises to 83 in Hong Kong inferno
description: Emergency crews have found a survivor on the 16th floor of the Hong Kong apartment complex that went up in flames yesterday, killing at least 83 people and leaving 250 people missing. #fire #apartmentfire #inferno #hongkong #firefighters

title: France reintroduces form of youth military service
description: France is bringing back military conscription on a volunteer basis. The program will primarily target 18 and 19-year-olds in a bid to bolster the country's defence force. #france #conscription #militaryservice #europe #emmanuelmacron

title: Trump confirms a National Guard has died after Washington DC shooting
description: US President Donald Trump has confirmed one of the National Guards shot in Washington, DC has died. National Guard member, Specialist Sarah Beckstrom, who was shot near the US Presidential residence, was described by Trump as a "magnificent person ... outstanding in every way". #washingtondc #whitehouse #trump #nationalguard #crime

title: 'I am not alone': Skateboarding Ireland's coast for suicide awareness | 7NEWS
description: Becky Gilmour (@beckygilmore_) , a 26-year-old from Limerick, Ireland is skateboarding the entire Wild Atlantic Way coastal route to raise awareness about suicide and mental health after losing a close friend. She has travelled 2,800 kilometres over five months, creating murals at each county and sharing stories of people she meets along the way. The journey will cover approximately 3,100 kilometres when complete, finishing in Portrush where she and her friend used to skateboard together.
